models.name: todo_list_task
models.description: Stores individual todo tasks for a single-user application. Each task contains a unique identifier, a text description of the task (up to 500 characters), and a completion status. This table has no relationships to other entities, no timestamps, no user identifiers, no metadata, and no audit fields. It is the sole persistent entity in the system. All operations (create, read, update, delete) are performed against this table using a simple client-side interface with no user authentication or session management. Data persistence is local and device-bound.

plainFields.name: title
plainFields.description: The text content of the task. Must contain at least one non-whitespace character. Truncated to 500 characters if longer. Leading and trailing whitespace is removed before storage. Preserves internal whitespace. Case-sensitive.

plainFields.name: is_completed
plainFields.description: The completion status of the task. true when the task has been marked as completed (checked). false when the task is pending. No other values are permitted. Default value is false.
